entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
